Package com.opengamma.strata.pricer.impl.volatility.smile

Internal implementations of volatility smile.

Code in this package and subpackages may change in a non-backwards compatible way.

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SmileModelData
    A data bundle of a volatility model.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SabrFormulaData
    The data bundle for SABR formula.
    SabrFormulaDataTest
    Test SabrFormulaData.
    SabrHaganVolatilityFunctionProvider
    The Hagan SABR volatility function provider.
    SabrHaganVolatilityFunctionProviderTest
    Test SabrHaganVolatilityFunctionProvider.

    SABR model fitter.
    SabrModelFitterTest

    SabrPerformance
    Test performance.
    SabrVolatilityFunctionProviderTestCase

    Smile model fitter.
    SmileModelFitterTest<T extends SmileModelData>
    Test case for smile model fitters.
    SsviFormulaData
    The data bundle for SSVI smile formula.
    SsviFormulaDataTest

    SsviVolatilityFunction

    VolatilityFunctionProvider<T extends SmileModelData>
    Provides functions that return volatility and its sensitivity to volatility model parameters.
